data.id#ID: Unique identifier using the a URN pattern (e.x. rule:identification:property)
data.root#Root: The root boolean field designates an entry rule. A set must have 1 or more root rules.For example if 3 rules exist, but 1 of those rules is oneOf for the 2 other rules, the runtime needs to start at the root rule.The Disco District Party Set set demonstrates this specific use case.
